TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A virus that causes respiratory infections with cold-like symptoms. Also called RSV.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "respiratory syncytial virus"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "virus sincitial respiratorio"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Virus que causa infecciones respiratorias con síntomas similares al resfriado. También se llama VSR.
